participant_1.background:
I want to stay close to my mom and my grandchildren.
My family and I have a special bond, even though I talk in my sleep.
I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in.
I miss my family but I enjoy my job and my hobbies.
My sunflowers are a source of pride for me, but my family's income comes from my job as a farmer.

participant_2.background:
I read fantasy novels to escape my reality.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can be myself and not be judged for my music taste or my dreams.
I broke my leg when I was a kid, but I'm all better now!
i work at a grocery store.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.

content.text: Hi I'm Sarah! I'm a farmer, and I love to grow sunflowers. I also love to read fantasy novels to escape my reality.
Hi Sarah! I'm a grocery store worker who lives in a small town in the Midwest. I love to read fantasy novels too! It's a great way to escape reality.
I'm glad to meet you! What's your favorite fantasy novel?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. I think I'd have to say The Lord of the Rings series by J.R.R. Tolkien.
That's one of my favorites too! I love the world Tolkien created. It's so immersive and full of wonder.
Me too! I've read the series so many times, and I always find something new to appreciate.
Me too! I'm always amazed by the detail and thoughtfulness that Tolkien put into his world.
It's really something special. I'm glad I met you, Sarah!
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who loves fantasy novels as much as I do.
Maybe we can read some of our favorite books together sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to read some books with you
